member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Player.Pause
member.summary: Activates the pause mode of the player (pauses media playback).

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Player.Resume
member.summary: Deactivates the pause mode of the player (resumes paused media).

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Player.PlayPrevious
member.summary: Requests to play previous media (raises the Player.Events.MediaPreviousRequested event).

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Player.PlayNext
member.summary: Requests to play next media (raises the Player.Events.MediaNextRequested event).

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Player.Stop
member.summary: Stops media playback.

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Player.Reset
member.summary: Stops media playback and resets the display mode, audio and start/end positions settings of the player to their default values.

member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment of the text in the text area of the infolabel (default: MiddleCenter).

member.summary: Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the text area of the infolabel.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the corners of the infolabel are rounded (default: false).

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.InfoLabel.BackImageLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the background image layout of the infolabel (default: Stretch).

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.InfoLabel.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration, in milliseconds, to display the infolabel, that is used when not specified in the show method - default value: 1000.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.InfoLabel.Align
member.summary: Gets or sets the infolabel alignment that is used when not specified in the show method - default value: TopCenter.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.InfoLabel.AlignOffset
member.summary: Gets of sets the alignment location offset, in pixels, of the infolabel - default values: x = 0, y = 0.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.InfoLabel.FadeOutSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the speed of the fade out effect of the infolabel, values 1 (slow) to 100 (fast) - default value: 20.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.InfoLabel.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity level of the infolabel, values 0.0 (full transparency) to 1.0 (no transparency) - default value: 1.0.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.InfoLabel.Transparent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background of the infolabel is transparent - default value: false.

member.name: T:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode
member.summary: Specifies the size and location of the video on the display of the player.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.Normal
member.summary: Size: original size. Location: topleft of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: no, grow: no.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.Center
member.summary: Size: original size. Location: center of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: no, grow: no.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.Stretch
member.summary: Size: same size as the display of the player. Location: topleft of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: yes.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.Zoom
member.summary: Size: the largest possible size within the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio. Location: topleft of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: yes.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.ZoomCenter
member.summary: Size: the largest possible size within the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio. Location: center of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: yes.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.CoverCenter
member.summary: Size: same size as the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio, but possibly with horizontal or vertical image cropping. Location: center of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: yes.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.SizeToFit
member.summary: Size: original size or the largest possible size within the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio. Location: topleft of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: if smaller than original size.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.SizeToFitCenter
member.summary: Size: original size or the largest possible size within the display of the player while maintaining the aspect ratio. Location: center of the display of the player. Display resize: shrink: yes, grow: if smaller than original size.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.Custom
member.summary: Size, Location and Display resize: set from Player.Display.SetCustomMode callback method.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayMode.Manual
member.summary: Size: set manually. Location: set manually. Display resize: shrink: no, grow: no.

member.name: T:PVS.AVPlayer.FullScreenMode
member.summary: Specifies the fullscreen mode of the player.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.FullScreenMode.Display
member.summary: The display of the player is shown fullscreen.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.FullScreenMode.Parent
member.summary: The (parent) control that contains the display of the player is shown fullscreen.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.FullScreenMode.Form
member.summary: The form that contains the display of the player is shown fullscreen.

member.name: T:PVS.AVPlayer.OverlayMode
member.summary: Specifies the size mode of the display overlay of the player.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.OverlayMode.Display
member.summary: The overlay has the same size and position as the display of the player.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.OverlayMode.Video
member.summary: The overlay has the same size and position as the visible part of the video image on the display of the player.

member.name: T:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaLength
member.summary: Specifies the part of the playing media whose length (duration) is to be obtained.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaLength.BeginToEnd
member.summary: The total length (duration) of the playing media.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaLength.FromBegin
member.summary: The length (duration) of the playing media from the natural beginning of the media to the current position.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaLength.FromStart
member.summary: The length (duration) of the playing media from Player.Media.StartPosition to the current position.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaLength.ToEnd
member.summary: The length (duration) of the playing media from the current position to the natural end of the media.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaLength.ToStop
member.summary: The length (duration) of the playing media from the current position to Player.Media.StopPosition.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaLength.StartToStop
member.summary: The length (duration) of the playing media from Player.Media.StartPosition to Player.Media.StopPosition.

member.name: T:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaName
member.summary: Specifies the part of the file name of the playing media to be obtained.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaName.FileNameWithoutExtension
member.summary: The file name without path and extension of the playing media.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaName.FileName
member.summary: The file name and extension without path of the playing media.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaName.FullPath
member.summary: The file name with path and extension of the playing media.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaName.Extension
member.summary: The extension of the file name of the playing media.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaName.DirectoryName
member.summary: The path (directory) of the file name of the playing media.

member.name: F:PVS.AVPlayer.MediaName.PathRoot
member.summary: The root path (root directory) of the file name of the playing media.

member.summary: Gets the highest peak value of the audio output channels (ChannelsValues). Values are from 0.0 to 1.0 (inclusive) or -1 if media playback is paused, stopped or ended.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.PeakLevelEventArgs.ChannelsValues
member.summary: Gets the peak values of the audio output channels: Levels[0] contains the value of the left audio output channel and Levels[1] of the right channel. More channels can be present with, for example, surround sound systems. Values are from 0.0 to 1.0 (inclusive) or -1 if media playback is paused, stopped or ended.

member.summary: Provides access to the display clones settings of the player (e.g. Player.Display.Clones.Add).

member.summary: Provides access to the display overlay settings of the player (e.g. Player.Display.Overlay.Window).

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent window (form) of the display of the player is redrawn with display modes Normal, Center, CoverCenter, Custom and Manual when the display window of the player is resized (default: false).

member.summary: Gets the size and location of the parent window (form) of the display window of the player in its normal window state (e.g. when the form is maximized or fullscreen).

member.summary: Gets or sets the cursor used when dragging the player's display window when the Player.Display.DragEnabled option is enabled (default: Cursors.SizeAll).

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Display.SetShape(PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayShapeCallback)
member.summary: Sets a custom shape of the display window of the player. See also: Player.Display.Shape.
member.param: The method to be called when the shape of the display window needs to be updated. Use null or DisplayShape.Normal to set the normal shape of the display window.

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Display.SetShape(PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayShapeCallback,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a custom shape of the display window of the player. See also: Player.Display.Shape.
member.param: The method to be called when the shape of the display window needs to be updated. Use null or DisplayShape.Normal to set the normal shape of the display window.

A value indicating whether the shape is a video size related shape and the display window should be updated when the size of the video image changes. Use this option only with shapes related to the size of the video image, the shape of the display window is always updated when the size of the display window has changed.
A value indicating whether display overlays should also take the shape of the display window (may cause unwanted effects with display clones and other uses).

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Display.SetShape(PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayShape)
member.summary: Sets a custom shape of the display window of the player. See also: Player.Display.Shape.
member.param: A value indicating the preset shape of the display window of the player. If used with a form, set the border style of the form to none.

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Display.SetShape(PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayShape,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a custom shape of the display window of the player. See also: Player.Display.Shape.
member.param: A value indicating the preset shape of the display window of the player. If used with a form, set the border style of the form to none.
A value indicating whether the preset shape should be related to the size of the video image (value = true) or to the size of the display window (value = false).
A value indicating whether display overlays should also take the shape of the display window (may cause unwanted effects with display clones and other uses).

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.Display.Shape
member.summary: Gets or sets the shape of the display window of the player. When set, the shape is related to the video size with no overlay shape (default: DisplayShape.Normal). See also: Player.Display.SetShape.

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Display.SetMode(PVS.AVPlayer.DisplayModeCallback,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a custom display mode (size and location) of the video image on the display of the player. See also: Player.Display.Mode.
member.param: The method to be called when the size and/or location of the video image may need to be updated.
A value indicating whether this custom display mode should be activated immediately.

member.summary: Returns the length (duration) of the specified part of the playing media. See also Player.Media.Duration and .Length.

member.summary: Returns (part of) the file name of the playing media.
member.param: Specifies the part of the file name to return.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.Media.StartPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the playback start (or repeat begin) position of the playing media.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.Media.StopPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the playback stop (or repeat end) position of the playing media. TimeSpan.Zero or 00:00:00 = natural end of media.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.Media.StartPositionNext
member.summary: Gets or sets the playback start (or repeat begin) position of the player for the next media to play. When set and the next media starts playing, the value is copied to the Player.Media.StartPosition setting of the player and then reset to 00:00:00. Special use: values between 0 and 100 ms are interpreted as percentages of the length of the next media.

member.name: P:PVS.AVPlayer.Media.StopPositionNext
member.summary: Gets or sets the playback stop (or repeat end) position of the player for the next media to play. When set and the next media starts playing, the value is copied to the Player.Media.StopPosition setting of the player and then reset to 00:00:00. TimeSpan.Zero or 00:00:00 = natural end of media. Special use: values between 0 and 100 ms are interpreted as percentages of the length of the next media.

member.summary: Returns mp3 or wma media tag information from the playing media (image retrieved from media or folder).

member.summary: Returns mp3 or wma media tag information from the playing media.

member.name: M:PVS.AVPlayer.Media.GetTagInfo(System.String,PVS.AVPlayer.ImageSource)
member.summary: Returns mp3 or wma media tag information from the specified file.
